page.title: 16FOOD AND DRINK IN FORFAR
page.content: Lockwoods is a{canning}factory which cans all different kinds of fruit & vegetables.The workers inspect the food carefully and pick out all the bad ones.They wear clean aprons, overalls and white hats to protect the food.The cans are made of sheet iron coated with tin.When sealed,they are boiled in huge vats to kill any germs.The boxes are packed and sent to every shop or supermarket that has ordered them.When the factory workers have finished their day at 5pm the Lockwoods bus takes them home. Forfar has 2{meat}factories called Strathmore Meat amd Angus Countryside Products.They make sausage rolls, meat pies,bridies & steak pies etc.to deliver to different butchers and supermarkets all over Scotland.They also make delicious haggis for Burns Suppers.
